name: Alexland
startIntroPart1: Buenas, queen Alex of Alexland! You've inhereted the land owned by great Empires, Caliphates and Kingdoms, leaving a rich culture behind. From the highs of Captain's Mountain to the low Guada Valley, through the harsh Nala Desert to the cold highs of Sierra Nevada, and sandwicthed between the Sun Coast and the Moon Coast, your lands are filled with wonder and magic!
startIntroPart2: My queen, stand up and make an empire of your own. Claim lands and freedom to your people! For a free Alexland and Humanity! Buena Suerte. Also don't forget to be silly sometimes :3
declaringWar: I have planned this for a long time >:3c… ¡Prepárate para la batalla!
attacked: Yo! Why? I haven’t done anything to you… at least not yet. Anyways, prepare to die now >:3
defeated: Welp, time to stop playing this game for today. Go and conquer the entire world now, or something. Adios :3
introduction: ¡¡¡Hola!!! I’m Alex! Welcome to my empire! I hope we have a great time together :3
hateLetsHearIt: C'mon.. I don’t have all day
afterPeace: GRACIAS! I was about to collapse in like 2 or 3 turns
tradeRequest: Olle bestie, do you like this?
uniques: [+2 Gold, +3 Culture, +3 Science, +5 Production] from each Trade Route
